front.title: Separating Control and Data Plane for Proxy Mobile IPv6

abstract.t: Proxy Mobile IPv6 is a network-based mobility management protocol.The mobility entities involved in the Proxy Mobile IPv6 protocol, theMobile Access Gateway (MAG) and the Local Mobility Anchor (LMA),setup tunnels dynamically to manage mobility for a mobile node withinthe Proxy Mobile IPv6 domain. This document describes an extensionto the Proxy Mobile IPv6 protocol to register a data plane address,that is different from the Proxy Care-of Address with the LMA. Thisallows separation of control and data plane.
